ConfigurationHelper.GetValue(NameValueCollection, String, String) Method

Retrieves the named value from the specified NameValueCollection.

   ByVal values As NameValueCollection, _
   ByVal name As String, _

) As String
[C#]

   NameValueCollection values,
   string name,
   string defaultValue
);

Parameters

values
may be null
name
the value's key
defaultValue
the default value, if not found

Return Value

if values is not null, the value returned by values[name]. null otherwise.
